Thalamus of WHS11.EditorialNote: Does not look like the dorsal lateral nucleus is included, although it should be.  Also looks like it does include the entopeduncular nucleus on some slices.  Needs review.
Thalamus of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of thalamus in Waxholm 2011 mouse brain atlas, as seen in T2* volume.  As seen in sagittal: at midline dorsally bounded by 3rd ventricle and epithalamus; ventrally by hypothalamus. Appears brighter than epithalamus.  Does not include fornix.
